quote: He turned then and those blue eyes met hers from across the sea of people. Her stomach bottomed out. Damn it. She couldn't be attracted to the arrogant ass.Somehow repeating herself wasn't helping.
quote_letters: HE TURNED THEN AND THOSE BLUE EYES MET HERS FROM ACROSS THE SEA OF PEOPLE HER STOMACH BOTTOMED OUT DAMN IT SHE COULDNT BE ATTRACTED TO THE ARROGANT ASSSOMEHOW REPEATING HERSELF WASNT HELPING
